name: 3dRSFC
author: AFNI Developers
description: Program to calculate common resting state functional connectivity (RSFC) parameters.

inputs.description: Input dataset (3D+time sequence of volumes)
inputs.name: Input Dataset

inputs.description: Lowest frequency in the passband, in Hz
inputs.name: Frequency Band Bottom

inputs.description: Highest frequency in the passband (must be > fbot)
inputs.name: Frequency Band Top

inputs.description: Despike each time series before other processing.
inputs.name: Despike Flag

inputs.description: Also orthogonalize input to columns in specified file.
inputs.name: Ort File

inputs.description: Orthogonalize each voxel to the corresponding voxel time series in specified dataset.
inputs.name: Dsort File

inputs.description: Skip the quadratic detrending of input before FFT-based bandpassing.
inputs.name: No Detrend Flag

inputs.description: Set time step to specified value in seconds.
inputs.name: Time Step

inputs.description: Set the FFT length to specified value.
inputs.name: NFFT Value

inputs.description: Make all output time series have L2 norm = 1.
inputs.name: Normalize Flag

inputs.description: Specify mask dataset.
inputs.name: Mask File

inputs.description: Create a mask from the input dataset.
inputs.name: Automask Flag

inputs.description: Blur inside the mask only with specified FWHM in mm.
inputs.name: Blur FWHM

inputs.description: Replace each vector by the local Principal Vector from a neighborhood radius.
inputs.name: LocalPV Radius

inputs.description: Alternative way to specify input dataset.
inputs.name: Input Dataset Alternative

inputs.description: Alternative way to specify passband frequencies.
inputs.name: Passband Frequencies

inputs.description: Set prefix name of the output dataset.
inputs.name: Output Prefix

inputs.description: Turn off the fun and informative messages.
inputs.name: Quiet Flag

inputs.description: Don't output processed time series, just output parameters.
inputs.name: No RS Output Flag

inputs.description: Output the un-bandpassed series as well.
inputs.name: Un-Bandpass Output Flag

inputs.description: Exclude RSFA output (default is to include).
inputs.name: No RSFA Flag

inputs.description: Bandpassing as the last step in the processing sequence.
inputs.name: Bandpass at End Flag

inputs.description: Don't check for initial positive transients in the data.
inputs.name: No Transients Flag

inputs.description: Equivalent to -notrans, skips checking for initial transients.
inputs.name: No Saturation Flag
